Sponsors

Be Part of the Mexican NLP Summer School 2024

Our summer school is a collective effort made possible by the dedication of many. If you’re enthusiastic about volunteering for our 2024 edition, we’d love to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us and join our team.

Interested in sponsoring? Your support can make a big difference. For details on sponsorship opportunities and benefits, please check our Sponsor Policy.
